Description: Out (Ankle) - Poythress has been ruled OUT for Sunday's (Nov 25) game.
Out (Personal) - Bird is still on a leave of absence from the team until he handles his legal issues.
Day To Day (Back) - Brown is listed as Doubtful for Monday's (Nov 26) game.
Day To Day (Knee) - Rozier is Probable for Monday's (Nov 26) game.
Out (Left hamstring) - Graham has been diagnosed with a strained left hamstring and is expected to be out for two months according to The Athletics' Shams Charania.
Out (Right Foot Dislocation) - LeVert has been diagnosed with a dislocation of his right foot and will not require surgery.
Out (Right Ankle Sprain) - Kidd-Gilchrist has been ruled OUT for Sunday's (Nov 25) game.
Out (Rib) - The Hornets announced Parker is active but will not play in Sunday's (Nov 25) game.
Out (Knee) - The Bulls announced Dunn will miss four-to-six weeks with a moderate MCL sprain.
Day To Day (Back Spasms) - Hutchison is listed as Questionable for Monday's (Nov 26) game.

Out (Elbow) - Markkanen is making progress and could start contact in practice sometime next week according to a report from the Chicago Sun-Times. The hope is that he's able to return to action sometime in the next few weeks.
Out (Knee) - Portis is slated to miss 4-6 weeks with a sprained MCL in his right knee according to Malika Andrews of ESPN.
Out (Ankle) - The Bulls announced Valentine will undergo surgery on his ankle and his recovery time is 4-6 months.
Out (Left Ankle Sprain) - The Cavs announced that Dekker is dealing with a left ankle sprain. He will miss at least the next 2-4 weeks of action.
Day To Day (Shoulder) - Hill will miss two weeks with a sprained right shoulder according to Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN.
Out (Toe) - Love said he doesn't expect to return to action until at least January according to a report from ESPN.com. He had toe surgery in early November and has been out ever since.
Out (Foot) - Nowitzki is still rehabbing and head coach Rick Carlisle said he'd be excited if he was able to play sometime this month according to Eddie Sefko of the Dallas Morning News.
Day To Day (Left knee) - Powell has been ruled OUT for Saturday's (Nov 24) game.
Day To Day (Wrist) - Smith has been ruled OUT of Saturday's (Nov 24) game against the Celtics.
Out (Right Hip/Core Strain) - Barton had surgery to repair hip and core muscles. He's expected to miss at least six weeks of action according to a report from the Denver Post.
Day To Day (Left Ankle Soreness) - Harris has been ruled OUT for Saturday's (Nov 24) game.
Day To Day (Knee) - Milsap left Saturday's (Nov 24) game with a left knee contusion and is probable to return.
Out (Back) - Porter does not have a timetable for a return according to Harrison Wind of BSNDenver.com.
Out (Hip) - Thomas does not have a timetable for a return according to Harrison Wind of BSNDenver.com.
Out (Foot) - Vanderbilt does not have a timetable for a return according to Harrison Wind of BSNDenver.com.
Out (Nasal Fracture) - The Pistons have listed Ellenson as OUT for Sunday's game (Nov. 25).
Out (Shoulder) - Kennard is making progress and is expected to miss about two more weeks of action according to James Edwards III of The Athletic.
Out (Achilles) - Cousins is making progress but there is no timetable for his return according to a report from the San Francisco Chronicle.
Out (Left Groin Strain) - The Warriors announced G Stephen Curry will miss the next three games.
Day To Day (Toe) - Green has been ruled OUT for Saturday's (Nov 24) game against the Kings.
Day To Day (Foot) - McKinnie has been ruled OUT for Saturday's (Nov 24) game against the Kings.
Day To Day (Ankle) - Green is listed as Questionable for Monday's (Nov 26) game.
Out (Right Calf Strain) - The Rockets have listed Nene as OUT for Friday's game (Nov. 23) against the Pistons.

Out (Knee) - Knight has no timetable for a return according to Shams Charania of The Athletic. He's been on the sidelines all season as he recovers from knee surgery and then an infection in the knee.
Day To Day (Leg) - Paul is listed as Questionable for Monday's (Nov 26) game.
Day To Day (Left Ankle Sprain) - Qi has been ruled OUT for Saturday's (Nov 24) game.
Day To Day (Knee) - Oladipo did not play in Friday's game (Nov. 23) against the Spurs.
Day To Day (Ankle) - Turner did not play in Friday's (Nov 23) game.
Out (Knee) - Mbah a Moute has been ruled OUT for Sunday's (Nov 25) game.
Out (Hand) - The Lakers announced that Rondo had surgery to repair his fractured hand. He's expected to miss 4-5 weeks.
Out (Left Knee Strain) - Brooks is expected to miss 6-8 weeks with a Grade 2 MCL sprain according to Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN.
Out (Knee) - Parsons will be re-evaluated in two weeks as he's still limited by knee and back soreness according to Mark Giannotto of the Memphis Commercial Appeal.
Out (Right Knee) - The Heat announced Dragic had his knee drained and he will miss the next 3 games.
Out (Right hamstring) - Johnson will not travel with the Heat for their upcoming 2 game road trip.
Out (Ankle) - Waiters still does not have a timetable for return.
Day To Day (Knee) - DiVencenzo is listed as Questionable for Monday's (Nov 26) game.

Out (Wrist) - Henson is dealing with a torn ligament in his left wrist. He's expected to miss at least the next 12 weeks of action but he still hopes to return this season according to Sham Charania of The Athletic.
Day To Day (Knee) - Ilyasova is listed as Questionable for Monday's (Nov 26) game.
Day To Day (Right Hamstring Strain) - The Bucks have listed Wilson as OUT for Saturday's (Nov 24) game.
Out (Knee) - Bayless said he's not sure when he will return to action according to Chris Hine of The Minneapolis Star Tribune. He's recovering from a hyperextended knee.
Day To Day (Right Hip Strain) - Davis is listed as Questionable for Monday's (Nov 26) game.
Out (Fractured Finger) - Payton will undergo surgery on his fractured left pinky and is expected to miss the next 6 weeks.
Out (Neck) - The Knicks have listed Lee as OUT for Friday's game (Nov. 23) against the Pelicans.
Out (Knee) - There is no timetable for Porzingis to return this season according to Chris Mannix of Yahoo Sports. There is a chance he may miss a majority if not the entire season.
Out (Left Knee Soreness) - The Knicks announced that Thomas had surgery on his left knee to remove some loose bodies from it. He will rehab and then be re-evaluated in four weeks.
Out (Ankle) - Diallo is dealing with a left ankle sprain and will be re-evaluated in 7-10 days according Maddie Lee of The Oklahoman.
Day To Day (Ankle) - Ferguson is listed as OUT for Saturday's (Nov 24) game.
Out (Knee) - Roberson had a setback in his recovery and will be re-evaluated in two months according to Royce Young of ESPN.
Out (Sore Right Knee) - The Magic have listed Mozgov as OUT for Sunday's game (Nov. 25).
Out (Leg) - The 76ers announced that Bolden is dealing with a cortical crack in the fibula of his right leg. He's out and will be re-evaluated in 10 days.
Out (Shoulder/Wrist) - Fultz is dealing with a wrist injury in addition to a right shoulder injury according to a report from The Athletic. Fultz is slated to see a specialist next week.
Out (Foot) - Team officials said Patton had surgery on his foot in September and there is no timetable for his return.
Out (Foot) - Smith is not expected to return until at least January according to a report from Kyle Neubeck of the PhillyVoice.com.
Day To Day (Knee) - Curry is listed as Probable for Sunday's (Nov 25) game against the Clippers.
Day To Day (Sore Left Knee) - Harkless is listed as Probable for Sunday's (Nov 25) game against the Clippers.
Out (Right Calf Strain) - Koufos has been ruled OUT for Sunday's (Nov 25) game.
Out (Rest) - Shumpert has been ruled OUT for Sunday's (Nov 25) game.
Out (Foot) - Gasol is listed as OUT for Monday's (Nov 26) game.
Out For Season (Knee) - The Spurs announced Murray has suffered a torn ACL in his right knee.
Out (Knee) - Walker had surgery to repair a torn meniscus and he's expected to miss six to eight weeks according to Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN.
Out (Shoulder) - Powell is slated to miss 4-6 weeks with left shoulder subluxation according to Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN.
Out (Rib) - Mitchell has been ruled OUT for Sunday's (Nov 25) game against the Kings.
Day To Day (Neck) - Rubio is Probable for Sunday's (Nov 25) game.
Day To Day (Gluteal soreness) - Howard is listed as Questionable for Monday's (Nov 26) game.
